content: {"name": "The Salvation Army of Howard County", "alternate_name": "", "description": "FOOD PANTRY: Offers non-perishable food once every 30 days while supplies last. Call to schedule an appointment. Accepts donations of food. Also provides a monthly fresh produce give-away April -Oct, usually the 4th Mon, call to confirm.", "email": "", "url": "https://sa-md.org/centralmaryland/howard-county-service-thrift/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3267 Pine Orchard Lane", "address_2": null, "city": "Ellicott City", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21042", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.2814846, "longitude": -76.8634929}, "phones": [{"number": "(443) 656-3376", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must call during this time to register and book an appointment"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
